intro: Berkheya densifolia, commonly known as the denseleaf burkea, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a member of the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features dense, dark green foliage and produces yellow flowers that bloom in spring. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it suitable for arid and semi-arid environments. Its ornamental value and adaptability make it a popular choice for gardens and landscaping.
